pkgmetadata.longdescription: A video processing framework with simplicity in mind.

use.flag: Adds 32 bytes on the left and the right sides of each frame, fills them with a certain value, and checks their integrity after each filter. It can be used to detect buggy filters that write a little outside the frame.
